code:
```verilog
[BEGIN]
module TopModule (
    input logic a,  // 1-bit input
    input logic b,  // 1-bit input
    input logic c,  // 1-bit input
    input logic d,  // 1-bit input
    output logic q  // 1-bit output
);

    always @(*) begin
        q = (b & c) | (c & d) | (a & b); // No numeric constants to modify
    end

endmodule
[DONE]
```

iterations.code:

    output logic q  // 1-bit output
);

    always @(*) begin

endmodule
issues: Numeric constants should have explicit size (e.g., 1'b0 not 0)
